Name: Blanche Refresher
Ingredients: 15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Drizzle Green Chartreuse all over the top of the drink.
Review: Challenging ingredients, including a whole shot of absinthe, combine to make a very approachable, aptly refreshing cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2013 by Stephen Quainton at B.Y.O.C. Bar, Brighton, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Blanche Refresher contains 267 calories
